revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: From Menches, village scribe of Kerkeosiris. The undermentioned holdings being returned as unproductive in the survey according to crops for the 5th year, I undertake to provide the artaba-tax upon them for the said year or to measure it out from my private means. Katoikoi: Polemon son of Ammonios 20 arouras, 20 artabas; Asklepiades son of Ptolemaios 24 arouras, 24 artabas; Maron son of Dionysios 25 arouras, 25 artabas; total for katoikoi 69 arouras, 69 artabas. Ephodos: Ptolemaios son of Meniskos 24 arouras, 24 artabas. In all 93 arouras, 93 artabas. 5th year, Mecheir 29.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., I.75 (col. III, lines 2-14) Cuvigny, L'Arpentage par especes dans l'Egypte ptolemaique, no. 22.
